overview.title: Communications Hub
overview.description: Central module for managing all client and team communications across email, SMS, and internal messaging channels
overview.purpose: Track, send, and manage all case-related communications with complete audit trails

whatIsThis.summary: The Communications module provides a unified interface for managing all correspondence related to your cases and clients, including emails, SMS messages, and internal notes.

whyItMatters.businessValue: Proper communication management ensures nothing falls through the cracks, maintains client relationships, and provides documentation for disputes or compliance.

faqs.question: Why didn't my email get delivered?
faqs.answer: Check delivery status in communication history. Common issues: invalid email address, spam filtering, or email service configuration. Retry or use alternative contact method.

faqs.question: Can clients see internal notes?
faqs.answer: No. Internal notes are visible only to team members. Use the 'Internal' channel for notes that should not be visible to clients.

faqs.question: How do I find old communications?
faqs.answer: Use the History section with search. Filter by date range, case, client, or keywords to narrow results.
